verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> many such <S%H7227>things.<s%> You are all <S%H5999>miserable<s%> <S%H5162>comforters!<s%>
Shall <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> have an <S%H7093>end?<s%> Or what <S%H4834>provokes<s%> you that you <S%H6030>answer?<s%>

I also could <S%H1696>speak<s%> as you <S%H3863>do.<s%> If your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3426>were<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>'s <S%H2266>place,<s%> I could join <S%H4405>words<s%> together against <S%H5128>you,<s%> and shake my <S%H7218>head<s%> at <S%H1119>you,<s%>
but I would <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> The <S%H5205>solace<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> would relieve <S%H2820>you.<s%>
"Though I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> my <S%H3511>grief<s%> is not <S%H2820>subsided.<s%> Though I <S%H2308>forbear,<s%> what am I <S%H1980>eased?<s%>
But <S%H3811>now,<s%> God, you have surely worn me <S%H8074>out.<s%> You have made desolate all my <S%H5712>company.<s%>
You have <S%H7059>shriveled<s%> me <S%H5707>up.<s%> This is a witness against <S%H3585>me.<s%> My leanness rises <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H6030>me.<s%> It testifies to my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

He has <S%H2963>torn<s%> me in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and <S%H7852>persecuted<s%> <S%H2786>me.<s%> He has gnashed on me with his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%> My <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H3913>sharpens<s%> his eyes on <S%H5869>me.<s%>

They have <S%H6473>gaped<s%> on me with their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> They have <S%H5221>struck<s%> me on the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> <S%H2781>reproachfully.<s%> They <S%H4390>gather<s%> themselves together against <S%H3162>me.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5462>delivers<s%> me to the <S%H5760>ungodly,<s%> and casts me <S%H3399>into<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

I was at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> and he broke me <S%H6565>apart.<s%> <S%H270>Yes,<s%> he has taken me by the <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and dashed me to <S%H6327>pieces.<s%> He has also set me <S%H6965>up<s%> for his <S%H4307>target.<s%>

His <S%H7228>archers<s%> <S%H5437>surround<s%> <S%H6398>me.<s%> He splits my <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> <S%H6398>apart,<s%> and does not <S%H2550>spare.<s%> He pours <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H4845>gall<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
He <S%H6555>breaks<s%> me with <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> <S%H6556>breach.<s%> He <S%H7323>runs<s%> on me like a <S%H1368>giant.<s%>
I have <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on my <S%H1539>skin,<s%> and have <S%H5953>thrust<s%> my <S%H7161>horn<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
My <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H2560>red<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping.<s%> Deep <S%H6757>darkness<s%> is on my <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>
Although there is no <S%H2555>violence<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is <S%H2134>pure.<s%>
<S%H776>"Earth,<s%> <S%H3680>don't<s%> cover my <S%H1818>blood.<s%> Let my <S%H2201>cry<s%> have no place to <S%H4725>rest.<s%>
Even <S%H5707>now,<s%> behold, my witness is in <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> He who <S%H7717>vouches<s%> for me is on <S%H4791>high.<s%>
My <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H3887>scoff<s%> at <S%H5869>me.<s%> My eyes pour <S%H1811>out<s%> tears to <S%H433>God,<s%>
that he would <S%H3198>maintain<s%> the right of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with <S%H433>God,<s%> of a son of <S%H120>man<s%> with his <S%H1121>neighbor!<s%>
For when a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have <S%H857>come,<s%> I shall <S%H857>go<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> of no <S%H7725>return.<s%>
